name: apify-scrappey
title: Scrappey Web Scraper - Cloudflare Bypass & Antibot Solver
description: Web scraping actor with automatic Cloudflare bypass, antibot solving (Datadome, PerimeterX, Kasada, Akamai), captcha solving (reCAPTCHA, hCaptcha, Turnstile), browser automation, and session management. Powered by Scrappey.com API.
